long_description: Bring your international flair with you into the backcountry with the Snow Peak Compact chopsticks. They are the perfect match for a freeze-dried Thai dinner. Made of stainless steel and recycled birch wood from old baseball bats. Take-apart design features threaded brass fittings between the wood tip and handle. Removable brass end-plugs allow the wooden tips to slip inside the hollow handles for storage. Cordura(R) nylon sleeve keeps the Snow Peak Compact chopsticks together during travel.
short_description: Bring your international flair with you into the backcountry with the Snow Peak Compact chopsticks. They are the perfect match for a freeze-dried Thai dinner.
